Module org.example.cab302_project
Package org.example.cab302_project

Class IngredientsDAO

java.lang.Object
org.example.cab302_project.IngredientsDAO
public class IngredientsDAO extends Object
This is a Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing the ingredients in the database and tables This DAO provides crud methods to create read update and delete from the database

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    IngredientsDAO()
    Constructs the IngredientsDAO and initializes the database connection.

      Inserts a new ingredient into the database
      Parameters:
      ingredients - The Ingredient object which contains relevant details to be inserted

    • getAll

      public List<Ingredient> getAll()
      Retrieves all ingredients from the database
      Returns:
      a List of all ingredients in the database

    • getQuickAccessIngredients

      public List<Ingredient> getQuickAccessIngredients()
      Retrieves Ingredients if quick access is true
      Returns:
      a list of ingredients with quick access enabled

    • getById

      public Ingredient getById(int id)
      Retrieve an ingredient from the database by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to retrieve
      Returns:
      the ingredient with the specified ID, or returns null if it is not found

    • update

      public void update(Ingredient ingredient)
      Update an existing ingredient in the database
      Parameters:
      ingredient - the ingredient object with updated details

    • ingredientExists

      public boolean ingredientExists(String ingredientName)
      Checks if an ingredient with the given name already exists
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to check
      Returns:
      True if the ingredient already exists, otherwise returns a false

    • delete

      public boolean delete(Ingredient ingredient)
      Delete an ingredient from the database
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The name of the ingredient to delete
      Returns:
      True if the ingredient was deleted, otherwise returns false

      Closes the database connection
